mapper.select: select * from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_type = #{caseeType} and p10_project_casee_re.project_id = #{projectId} order by p10_casee.start_time desc LIMIT 1

select p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_casee.*,p10_casee_lawyer_re.actual_name as lawyerName,p10_court.court_name,p10_project_casee_re.actual_name as userName from p10_casee left join p10_project_casee_re on p10_project_casee_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_project on p10_project.project_id = p10_project_casee_re.project_id left join p10_casee_lawyer_re on p10_casee_lawyer_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_court on p10_court.court_id = p10_casee.court_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_id = #{caseeId}

select p10_casee.*,JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.effectiveDate") effectiveDate from p10_casee left join p10_target on p10_target.casee_id=p10_casee.casee_id left join p10_task_node on p10_task_node.target_id = p10_target.target_id where p10_casee.del_flag = 0 and p10_casee.casee_type in (2020,2021,2030) and p10_casee.status = 1 and p10_target.goal_type = 10001 and p10_task_node.form_data is not null and p10_task_node.node_key like "%ZZSDQK" and JSON_EXTRACT(p10_task_node.form_data, "$.effectiveDate") is not null
